mapper.delete: delete from paid where id=#{payId} and status="已缴纳"
delete from paid where id=#{id} and status="租金退回"
mapper.select: select p.id,p.item_id,p.item_name,p.price,p.paydate,p.user_id,p.master_id,p.status, u.user_name,u.phone, u2.user_name as master_name,u2.phone as master_phone from `paid` p left join `userList` u on p.user_id = u.user_id left join `userList` u2 on p.master_id = u2.user_id where p.user_id = #{userId} and p.status = "已缴纳"
select * from `paid` where item_id=#{itemId} and status="已缴纳"
select * from `paid` where id=#{orderNumber} and status="已缴纳"
